page.title: 02GENERAL FEATURES
page.content: There is a variety of holiday accomodation including Bed and Breakfast, holiday cottages, and a Motel. There are 3 public houses and a garage. Some of the roads are narrow with dangerous parts. It is a very quiet area. Sometimes it is very hot but it can get cold too and very wet. It is also very windy in Burnt Yates because of its exposed position. There are two small schools with about 30 to 40 pupils in whole school. Most of the area is grass land and is rough and hilly. In 1985 it has been a very wet summer. It affected the hay because the rain makes the bails too heavy and it is not dry enough. So, most farmers made it into silage. Probably, there will be too much silage produced.
